channel.title: Branding on Ongoing Marketing
channel.description: Recent content in Branding on Ongoing Marketing

item.title: Vision Pro on Marketing
item.description: What is Vision Pro In early June 2023, Apple has launched their new creative AR product which is called vision pro. According to the reaction of the industry , the product is undoubtedly beyond the expectation. On one hand it’s because to of the marketing strategy before its launch that Apple tried their best to pull down industry expectation. While on the other hand , vision pro does bring some features which are not predicted by the media worldwide.
